name: Appeal
description: Template for managing deadlines related to the appeals process, including filing notice of appeal, service, requesting proceedings, and filing memorandum and record of appeal

deadlines.name: File Notice of Appeal
deadlines.description: The appellant must file a Notice of Appeal within 14 days from the date of the judgment or order being appealed. This formally initiates the appeals process.

prompts.input: When was the Notice of Appeal filed?
prompts.pending: Notice of Appeal must be filed by <<date>> (<<from_now>>)

reminders.title: 10 days left to file Notice of Appeal
reminders.body: Hi <<first_name>>, you have 10 days remaining to file the Notice of Appeal (due <<deadline_date>>). Please begin preparation.

deadlines.name: Serve Notice of Appeal to opposite parties
deadlines.description: The appellant must serve the Notice of Appeal to all opposite parties within 7 days of filing it. This ensures all parties are properly notified of the appeal.

deadlines.name: File and Serve Letter asking for Proceedings
deadlines.description: The appellant must file and serve a letter requesting the lower court proceedings within 15 days of serving the Notice of Appeal. This letter requests the certified record of the lower court proceedings.

deadlines.description: The appellant must file the Memorandum of Appeal and Record of Appeal within 60 days of filing the letter requesting proceedings. The memorandum contains the grounds of appeal and the record contains all relevant court documents.
